title: Beyond Presence
description: We create foundational models for hyper-realistic, emotionally intelligent avatars that see, hear, and respond instantly. Our technology is available via API and a no-code platform, enabling businesses to deploy conversational video agents in minutes. We also offer pre-built agents for instant use. Built by founders who previously sold their AI digital humans company to Meta, we bring deep expertise in creating lifelike, responsive avatars that enhance engagement and automation.
